FuncDef: The display pki crl command displays the content of the CRL in the device. The display pki crl command displays the content of the CRL in the device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the PKI realm to which the CRL belongs.
The value must be an existing PKI realm name.

Specifies the name of a CRL file.
The value must be the name of an imported CRL file.
